channel.title: Creations on Sebastian Lubene
channel.description: Recent content in Creations on Sebastian Lubene

item.title: Covid Dashboard
item.description: Create dashboard Total Deaths per continent Percent population infected ( actual and estimate) Percent population infected per country Global numbers (Total cases, deaths, and death percentage)

item.title: Demographic data
item.description: For this project I used Python libraries: Pandas and Numpy This project consists in answering the following questions: How many people of each race are represented in this dataset? What is the average age of men? What is the percentage of people who have a Bachelor’s degree? What percentage of people with advanced education (Bachelors, Masters, or Doctorate) make more than 50K?

item.title: Docker image for Bitbucket CI/CD PipelinesÂ "shipit"
item.description: Provides required dependencies and additional utilities to simplify and codify the process of building, testing and delivering Atlassian plugins all the way to the live marketplace.Executes integration/AUT level tests against all stated compatible versions for the productUploads generated artifact to Atlassian marketplaceProvides corresponding metadata indicating version, release notes, and compatibility

item.title: Movie Correlation
item.description: For this project I used Python libraries: Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Seaborn Steps: Import Python libraries Read in Data using Pandas Check for missing data Data cleaning Find correlations in the data
